member.name: T:Windows.UI.WebUI.WebUISearchActivatedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information about the activated event that fires when the user searches the app from the Search charm and the app isn't the main app on screen.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.WebUI.WebUISearchActivatedEventArgs.CurrentlyShownApplicationViewId
member.summary: Gets the identifier for the currently shown app view.
member.returns: The identifier for the currently shown app view.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.WebUI.WebUISearchActivatedEventArgs.Language
member.summary: Gets the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) language tag (BCP 47 standard) that identifies the language currently associated with the user's text input device.
member.returns: The Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) BCP 47 standard language tag.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.WebUI.WebUISearchActivatedEventArgs.LinguisticDetails
member.summary: Gets a SearchPaneQueryLinguisticDetails object that provides info about query text that the user enters through an Input Method Editor (IME).
member.returns: The object that provides info about query text.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.WebUI.WebUISearchActivatedEventArgs.PreviousExecutionState
member.summary: Gets the execution state of the app before it was activated.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.WebUI.WebUISearchActivatedEventArgs.QueryText
member.summary: Gets the text that the user wants the app to search for. The user entered this text into the search box of the search pane.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.WebUI.WebUISearchActivatedEventArgs.SplashScreen
member.summary: Gets the splash screen object that provides information about the transition from the splash screen to the activated app.
member.returns: The object that provides splash screen information.
